title: Episode 291: Lizzo
description: “Still Bad” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Lizzo is a Grammy- and Emmy-winning singer, rapper, songwriter, and actress. She’s been putting out music since 2013, and her last two albums both went platinum. Her fifth album, Love In Real Life, comes out this summer.
